Name: Hammerwatch
About the game: A hack and slash action adventure, set in a fantasy pixel art environment. Play solo or co-op in this adventure from bottom to top of Castle Hammerwatch. Kill hordes of enemies with varied looks and features through four unique environments with traps, hidden secrets and puzzles. Key Features 6 different classes, with unique features and skills Character development through unlocks and upgrades Hard, medium and easy of course Customize difficulty with several different modifiers Controller support, supports various different gamepads Multiplayer COOP, for up to four players, online, LAN and local PC, MAC and Linux support Mod and editing support, make your own levels and change other things to your liking
Meta Title: Hammerwatch: Aug 12, 2013, Crackshell and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hammerwatch? Check out the release date (Aug 12, 2013), developer insights from Crackshell, and a complete game summary.
